title: Straightened Out
description: I'm a mob boss with a tarnished name, leading a kingdom in the shadows of disgrace.She's a ballerina, the sister of my underboss, dancing her way through life.Until her, all I wanted was to be straightened out.But with power comes sacrifice.With respect comes fear.With love comes death.The rule of the streets is to take or be taken.Some legends are born, others are made.But not all survive.
author: Janine Infante Bosco
